intro.title: Full Stack Developer
intro.quote: "No one is so big that they can't learn, nor so small that they can't teach."
intro.author: - Aesop

about.title: About Me
about.description:
I'm Lívia, a full stack developer with over 4 years of experience working with technologies like Node.js, TypeScript, React, and WordPress.



I value well-structured technical development with attention to user experience and clear communication. I believe great projects are born from listening, collaboration, and solutions designed with empathy.

mba.course: MBA in Software Engineering with AI

brq.title: BRQ Digital Solutions
brq.description: Responsible for developing and maintaining web applications, specifically in Renault Group's e-commerce projects, as a full stack developer.

clearsale.title: ClearSale
clearsale.description: Responsible for developing and maintaining web applications and scrapping services for various platforms, working on the back-end.

brq-2.description: Responsible for developing and maintaining web applications, specifically in Renault Group's after-sales systems, as a full-stack developer.

web.title: Web Development
web.description: Creation of scalable systems, REST APIs and robust solutions using Next.js, NestJS, MongoDB and AWS. Ideal for complex applications or cloud integrations.

pwa.title: Scalable PWAs
pwa.description: Progressive web and mobile applications using Firebase, Next.js and integrated authentication. Perfect for MVPs or lean products.

company.title: Corporate Websites
company.description: Beautiful, lightweight and objective websites for companies, professionals or local businesses, with good performance and basic SEO.

hearing.title: Human-Centered Approach
hearing.description: Empathetic communication, active listening, and a focus on turning ideas into personalized digital products. You speak, I translate into code.

scraper.title: Automations
scraper.description:
I build bridges between the scattered information on the web and the strategic value for your business. With expertise in automation and web scraping, I develop custom bots that navigate, extract, and structure data with high precision and efficiency.



Whether it's a CAPTCHA-protected site, a single-page application with infinite scrolling, or the need to collect millions of data points daily, I have the experience and the right tools for the job.

renault.title: Renault Store
renault.description:
I actively participated in the development team for the "Renault Store", a large-scale e-commerce platform designed for selling new vehicles in several Latin American countries.



As part of the team, I collaborated on building a robust and scalable full-stack solution. My responsibilities included developing reusable front-end components with Next.js and Chakra UI, and implementing endpoints and business logic in the back-end API with Nest.js.



I worked directly with TypeScript across the entire stack to ensure code quality and maintainability, as well as assisting with the modeling and integration of the PostgreSQL database. The project required a special focus on internationalization (i18n) to adapt the shopping experience to each specific market.

borala.title: Bora Lá!
borala.description:
I worked on the development of the "Bora Lá" project, a complete solution that includes an administrative dashboard and two mobile apps (PWAs). I was responsible for creating a unified and efficient experience for different user profiles.



On the front-end, I used Next.js to build both the control panel and the PWAs, ensuring performance and the ability to be installed on mobile phones. The interface was developed with Chakra UI to maintain visual consistency. For the back-end and infrastructure, I implemented an API with Nest.js and used Firebase services (like Authentication and Firestore) and Google Cloud Platform (GCP) to ensure scalability and data security.
